text: The Czech Republic women's national ball hockey team is the women's national ball hockey team of the Czech Republic, and a member of the International Street and Ball Hockey Federation (ISBHF). The team has competed in every Women’s Ball Hockey World Championship since its inception in 2007. ==History== In 2009, the Czech Republic were the host country for the first time in the history of the Women's Ball Hockey World Championship. With games contested in the city of Plzeň, the team enjoyed a podium finish. ===World Championships=== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center;" |- ! Year !! Location !!
